level.text: These rules apply to the procurement of goods or services, including construction services, by and for the Hospital:
Whether through purchase or lease; and
Whether the goods or services are already in existence or must be developed.
This chapter does not apply to any goods or services that the Hospital may acquire as a gift, or on a pro bono basis.
These rules shall not apply to:
The purchase or lease of real property by the Hospital;
The disposition of real or personal property by the Hospital; and
The disposition, sale or provision of services by the Hospital.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8507 (October 8, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3086 (April 18, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4565, 4567 (May 27, 2011).
